summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingAnua Retinol 0.1 Caffeine Revitalizing Eye Cream helps skin appear more radiant and balanced by addressing smile lines and eye area shading. It helps smooth skin texture for a youthful, refreshed look around the eyes.
details: DetailsBenefitsFormulated with 0.1% retinol and caffeine, this targeted eye cream is designed to care for under-eye shadows and sagging.Helps revitalize the skinâ€™s appearance and provides multi-benefit care for more luminous complexion.A fast-absorbing gentle & effective formula with 4 peptides and collagen helps skin look firmer, refreshed & revitalized.Infused with ceramides and hyaluronic acids, this lightweight eye cream deeply hydrates, and helps you say goodbye to a sleepless look.Key IngredientsRetinol 0.1% : Helps make the skin look firmer and youthful-looking.Caffeine 1% & Niacinamide 5% : Imporve your under-eye contours to achieve a natural glow.Ceramides & Hyaluronic Acid : Provide deep hydration with a moisture barrier.Research Results4.08% decrease in dark circle grade after 8 weeks1.63% increase in skin brighteness after 8 weeks13.49% decrease in fine lines after 8 weeks100% said skin around the eyes seems to be moist after 2 weeks of use100% said elasticity of skin around eyes seem to be improved after 2 weeks of use100% said morning swelling around the eyes seem to be improved after 2 weeks of useItem 2646982How To UseAfter cleansing, gently apply small dots around the eye area.If you're new to retinol, start by using it every other day and perform a patch test prior to use.IngredientsWater, Propanediol, Dipropylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Pentylene Glycol, Cyclohexasiloxane, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Polyglyceryl-3 Distearate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caffeine, Panthenol, Soluble Collagen, Squalane, Adenosine, Ceramide NP, Ceramide NG, Ceramide NS, Ceramide AP, Ceramide AS, Ceramide EOP, Hexapeptide-2, Copper Tripeptide-1, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Acetyl Dipeptide-1 Cetyl Ester, Retinol, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Dimethylsilanol Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Potassium Hyaluronate, Lecithin, Sorbitan Isostearate, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Sterols, Cholesterol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Phytosteryl/Behenyl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, how_to_use: After cleansing, gently apply small dots around the eye area.If you're new to retinol, start by using it every other day and perform a patch test prior to use.
